feed.title: GitHub Fortran Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Fortran in GitHub

entry.title: SPECFEM/specfem3d
entry.summary: SPECFEM3D_Cartesian simulates acoustic (fluid), elastic (solid), coupled acoustic/elastic, poroelastic or seismic wave propagation in any type of conforming mesh of hexahedra (structured or not).

entry.title: SPECFEM/specfem3d_globe
entry.summary: SPECFEM3D_GLOBE simulates global and regional (continental-scale) seismic wave propagation.
